sourcesContent: import React from 'react' // React leaflet imports import {MapContainer, TileLayer, Marker} from 'react-leaflet' function Map(props) { // get lattitude and longitude from props let lat = props.data.location.lat let lng = props.data.location.lng let city = props.data.location.city let region = props.data.location.region return ( <> ) } export default Map
